title: platinumsteel2016
author: platinumsteel2016
content: 1.) Can someone explain to me how the Robinhood Cash Card function when it comes using bitcoin?!All the youtube videos that I have seen doesn't mention crypto, just says saving money from purchasesand investments.2.) If I can use bitcoin with this card, is possible to send btc from my electrum wallet on laptop to theRobinhood Cash Card?
